Question
========

A hypothesis test is performed on a mean of 4.40 and standard deviation 2.90. The mean according to the null hypothesis is 4.50. Then the t-value at 100 subjects and 10000 subjects is respectively

Answerlist
----------

* -0.345 and -3.45.
* -0.290 and -0.029.
* -0.035 and -0.003.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* -0.345 and -3.45...: Correct
* -0.290 and -0.029...: Incorrect
* -0.035 and -0.003...: Incorrect
